title: A Few Additions to the List of False Narratives
sub_head: Exclusion is inclusion. Restrictions on political ideology are diversity.
body:
Regarding Andy Kessler’s “Bees are Fish and Other Fake Narratives” (WSJ.com, Inside View, June 19): I’d like to add a few more items to Mr. Kessler’s list of false narratives.
Let’s start with politics. Destroying culture and the advances of Western civilization is progressive. People who oppose some or all of the values of liberalism are liberal. Those who want to change the status quo are conservative.
